revision.text: Possibly: An historical relation of the Island Ceylon, in the East-Indies; together with an account of the detaining in captivity the author and divers other Englishmen now living there, and of the author's miraculous escape, illustrated with figures, and a map of the Island. (London, Royal Society, 1681). http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/977942205
